business_sub_desc:
Whether you're interested in selling our products as a distributor or just looking to make a single bulk order, we're thrilled about your interest in our products and look forward to helping you find a solution.

Fill out the online form to submit your information directly.

business_list.title: Business Partner / Distributor
business_list.summary: Join in our growth as an Anker brand distributor or vendor. Click here to learn more about partnership benefits.
business_list.text:
Join our growth as a distributor of Anker brand products.
Anker specializes in consumer electronics accessories such as replacement and external batteries, USB 3.0 connectivity devices, mouse and keyboard peripherals, and more. Since our company was founded in 2011, we've risen quickly as a recognized top-ranked seller and top-rated brand on Amazon in several product categories.

We look forward to continued growth and welcome new opportunities to increase sales and expand our regional distribution. We're looking to partner with companies who can offer:
• Demonstrated influence over a specific local market
• Proven and creative product promotion strategies
• Established sales and/or distribution channels

As an Anker business partner, you can look forward to the following benefits:
• Regular launches of new and innovative products
• Certified quality (CE, FCC, RoHS)
• Professional partner support
• Distributor Pricing

business_list.title: Corporate Gifts / Bulk Orders
business_list.summary: Anker products make the perfect gift for your employees and clients. We offer a range of customization services and discounts.
business_list.text:
Anker products make the perfect gift for your employees or clients.

For example, our Anker® Astro line of portable external batteries are always welcome companions for today's mobile age. High capacity power and compact designs help ensure that your most important partners stay connected to what matters most -- you, of course.

For corporate and bulk orders, we're happy to arrange discounts, dedicated logistics, and expedited shipping. We can also arrange to add your custom logo to our products and packaging. Let us know what your needs are, and we can find the best solution for you.

business_list.title: Government / Education Solutions
business_list.summary: Anker is honored to offer custom solutions to our government and education partners.
business_list.text:
Anker is honored to serve our government and education customers with VIP sales support.

Anker has already served government, military, and education customers with products that empower. For example, our Anker® Astro line of external batteries serve as reliable backup power for military users to stay connected in the most urgent situations. In education,our external batteries and smart gadget peripherals help teachers make the most of their teaching tools so they can place more focus on students rather than juggling technology.

For government and education bulk orders, we're happy to arrange discounts, dedicated logistics, and expedited shipping. We can also arrange to add your custom logo to our products and packaging. Let us know what your needs are, and we can find the best solution for you.
